data.name: PowerSchool Dark Theme
data.description:
This is a dark theme for the PCTI and RVS PowerSchool websites.

If your PowerSchool website isn't supported yet, send me the URL (for any PowerSchool page) and I'll add it.

Don't expect this to be updated consistently, if at all.

Credit: https://userstyles.org/styles/142847/pcti-powerschool-dark-theme
